name: Space Trap
description:
While trying to escape the rebel base, you fell into one of their traps. You are now stuck in an ever shrinking rooms with rebel bots (or are the bots stuck in the room with you?). Survive for as long as you can hoping for someone to hear your screams.

Fight and survive an endless horde of rebel bots in an ever shrinking room. Dash your way through enemy bullets to dodge them. Defeating the bots will keep the walls in their place and will grant you more time to live, stronger the enemy, more time you get to live. Watch out for power drops which can grant you a shield or can slow down time.

Made during Ludum Dare 42 - "Running out of Space"

Controls:

Move mouse to rotate the ship

WASD to move

Left Click to Shoot

LShift to Dash

ESC to Pause

Bug Fixes:
  • Fixed an issue when the ship won’t move in main menu after returning from the game
  • Added missing pause instruction in main menu
  • Remove the annoying loud sound at the start of the game
  • Minor performance improvements
Post Jam Version Changes:
  • Added an option to change movement scheme in settings menu/pause menu. Also, movement defaults to the traditional twin-stick shooter movement.
  • Shoot using both LMB and RMB.
  • Now you can choose to either click to shoot or hold to shoot from settings menu/pause menu.
  • Reduced default music and sfx volumes and added volume sliders for both in settings menu.
